name: Street Ranger - Virtual Reality
description:
• This game is for 3D mobile virtual reality headsets •

Use your virtual reality headset to experience and explore a blocky world, be sure to avoid traffic!

Get ready to explore in full virtual reality! Experience the real sensation and thrill of walking through a blocky town with your mobile virtual reality headset. This experience boasts a 360 VR FPS field of view, addicting and endless gameplay. Look in the direction you want the walk and get ready to explore!

• Features •

- Stereoscopic virtual reality rendering and headtracking for mobile VR
- Realistic traffic simulation
- Endless exploring gameplay
- Large world

Works with any mobile stereoscopic headset with a built in accelerometer.
